# <code>str upcase</code> for default

<div class='command-title'>Make text uppercase</div>

## Signature

```> str upcase ...(rest)```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Parameters

 * ```...rest <CellPath>```: optionally upcase text by column paths
## Examples

  Upcase contents
```shell
  > 'nu' | str upcase
```
